comments.html:
Any thoughts on why cisco doesn't implement support for show commands from any cli node?
Seems like a simple enough thing to do.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: I'm pushing for this, don't worry.
comments.name: xabrouck

comments.html:
Chinese Huayei devices in config-if mode do:
dis this (display this)


in cisco: "do sh run int f1/0/14"
(if f1/0/14 was the int you are focused into)

Why can't cisco give us that - or better ?
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
One problem with the "do" config command is if you are in "(dhcp-config)" mode, it'll do a "domain-name"!!! So if you try "(dhcp-config)#do dir" instead of a directory you just changed your DHCP domain name...

Thanks for all the greqat posts.
Cote
comments.name: cote
